entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
